defines.label: contains
defines.documentation: Returns true if the key is already in the mapping.

defines.label: isEmpty
defines.documentation: Returns true if the mapping is empty.

defines.label: keyAt
defines.documentation: Returns the key at the given mapping index.

defines.label: merged
defines.documentation: Creates a new instance from merging two mappings

defines.label: value
defines.documentation: Returns the value at given key.

defines.label: valueAt
defines.documentation: Returns the value at the given mapping index.
